metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9258 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: SQL injection vulnerability in ajax/getDropdownValue.php in GLPI before0.85.1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commandsvia the condition parameter.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
